title: About Us
subtitle: The chill philosophy behind the club

philosophy.heading: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content:
We started this club with a simple idea: running shouldn't be a chore. It should be the best part of your week.

Whether you're training for your first 5k or your fiftieth marathon, you have a place here. We don't care about splits or PBs on Sunday mornings. We care about fresh air, good company, and the promise of a hot coffee at the finish line.

vibes.heading: No Pressure, Just Vibes
vibes.content:
Forget the watch. Forget the pace. This run is for you.

We loop back, we chat, and we make sure no one runs alone (unless they want to!). It's not about how fast you go, but that you went at all.

values.title: All Paces Welcome
values.description: From walkers to speedsters, everyone's welcome.

values.title: Coffee & Brunch
values.description: We always end with food. It's the best motivation.

values.title: Rain or Shine
values.description: We run every Sunday. The weather is just scenery.

values.title: Drop In Anytime
values.description: No sign-up, no commitment. Just show up!

location.heading: When & Where
location.content:
We meet every Sunday at **9:00 AM** at the Bingham Market Place. Look for the group of slightly tired but enthusiastic people in running gear!

After the run, we grab breakfast at one of the local caf√©s. It's not optional ‚Äì it's the most important part of the workout.
